game.title: The Quest to the Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the artifact to the Archaeologist's House in the next village.
game.description: The ancient artifact is hidden in a secret chamber within the abandoned temple. Follow these steps: visit the local library for maps, then travel to the temple, and finally hand it over to the Archaeologist.
game.reward: 3000 gold coins and Ring of Time

task.description: Ask the librarian about the temple's location and obtain a map.

task.objective: Explore the temple and find the secret chamber
task.description: Follow the map to the temple, solve its puzzles, and locate the hidden chamber.

task.objective: Return the artifact to the Archaeologist's House
task.description: Bring the artifact to the house marked as 'Archaeologist's' in the next village.
